fr.cnes.doi.security

Class RoleAuthorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cnes.doi.security.RoleAuthorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    @Requirement(reqId="DOI_AUTH_010",
             reqName="Authentification par login/mot de passe")
public final class RoleAuthorizer
extends Object
implements Observer
    Security class for authentication by REALM.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert (jean-christophe.malapert@cnes.fr)
